text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump ➡️The COVID-19 pandemic will leave lasting scars on the U.S. economy, which will have an average unemployment rate of 6.1 percent through 2030, according to new projections from the Congressional Budget Office.
#trumpcovidfails #incompetent
